title: Package to create your own labels, certificates, and much more! :)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.

title: Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_accreditation
text: data data frame including names affiliations (optional affiliation.column NULL) create accreditation cards. path Folder path output printed event Title event name.column Column name data data frame specifies participant's name. affiliation.column Column name data data frame specifies participant's affiliation. lpic PNG object route. File route top-left image. Can blank set NULL. rpic PNG object route. File route top-right image. Can blank set NULL.

title: Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_accreditation
text: 'output' folder PDF documents inside

title: Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_accreditation
text: Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

title: Function to create accreditation cards (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_accreditation
code: data <- read_sheet(url='https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d         /16smXdP-Ehwu1cEmJTbJI1DerIpUrOcD7H5Ni6z9B07M/edit#gid=0') #> Error in open.connection(structure(4L, class = c("curl", "connection"), conn_id = <pointer: 0x0000000000000443>),     "rb"): Timeout was reached: [docs.google.com] Resolving timed out after 10000 milliseconds create_accreditation(data=data, path = "LabeleR_output", event="INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE OF MUGGLEOLOGY", name.column = "List", affiliation.column="Affiliation", lpic = NULL, rpic = NULL) #> Error in create_accreditation(data = data, path = "LabeleR_output", event = "INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE OF MUGGLEOLOGY",     name.column = "List", affiliation.column = "Affiliation",     lpic = NULL, rpic = NULL): The 'data' object must be a data frame.

title: Create certificate of attendance — create_certificate_attendance
code: create_certificate_attendance(   data = NULL,   path = NULL,   language = c("spanish", "english"),   type = NULL,   title = NULL,   organiser = NULL,   hours = NULL,   signer = NULL,   signer.position = NULL,   date = NULL,   speaker = NULL,   lpic = NULL,   rpic = NULL,   signature.pic = NULL,   name.column = NULL )

title: Create certificate of attendance — create_certificate_attendance
text: data data frame  create attendance certificates. path Folder path output printed language Select english spanish type Type event (conference, workshop, seminar...) title Title event organiser Name organizing entity hours Number hours event lasted signer Person credits certificate signer.position Position signer date Date event speaker Name speaker event lpic PNG object. File route top-left image. Can blank set NULL. rpic PNG object. File route top-right image. Can blank set NULL. signature.pic PNG object. File route signature image. Can blank set NULL. name.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies attendee's name.

title: Create certificate of participation — create_certificate_participation
text: data data frame including information create certificate participation path Folder path output printed language Select english spanish type Type event (conference, workshop, seminar...) organiser Name organizing entity hours Number hours event lasted signer Person credits certificate signer.position Position signer lpic PNG object route. File route top-left image. Can blank set NULL. rpic PNG object route. File route top-right image. Can blank set NULL. signature.pic PNG object route. File route signature image. Can blank set NULL. name.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies participant's name. affiliation.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies participant's affiliation date.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies date. title.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies communication title. comm.type.column Column name Google Sheet column specifies communication type (oral, poster, online...)

Dumbledore", signer.position="School Headmaster", lpic="/.../Logo.png", rpic=NULL, signature.pic = NULL, name.column="Name", affiliation.column="House", date.column="Date", title.column="Title", comm.type.column = "Comm.type") #> Error in open.connection(structure(6L, class = c("curl", "connection"), conn_id = <pointer: 0x000000000000048b>),     "rb"): Timeout was reached: [docs.google.com] Resolving timed out after 10000 milliseconds

what: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
title: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
text: Function create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page)

title: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
code: create_collection_label(   data = data,   path = NULL,   qr = NULL,   field1.column = NULL,   field2.column = NULL,   field3.column = NULL,   field4.column = NULL,   field5.column = NULL,   logo = NULL,   bgcolor = NULL,   textcolor = NULL )

title: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
text: data Data frame including create labels. path Folder path output printed qr String. Free text column data specifies text create QR code. specified value column name data, QRs equal, output specified qr. field1.column Column data specifies text print first field. field2.column Column data specifies text print second field. field3.column Column data specifies text print third field. field4.column Column data specifies text print fourth field. field5.column Column data specifies text print fifth field. logo PNG object route. File route bottom image. Can blank set NULL. bgcolor HTML color use label background. Default D0ECC1 textcolor HTML color use label text. Default 1E3F20

title: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
text: Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

title: Function to create create collection labels (8 per DIN-A4 page) — create_collection_label
code: data <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/         1Bd_IVgGup4MapTgPq-cqqP05zYl-Q4SfUCBJ5oDSrMs/edit?usp=sharing") #> Error in open.connection(structure(7L, class = c("curl", "connection"), conn_id = <pointer: 0x00000000000004ac>),     "rb"): Timeout was reached: [docs.google.com] Operation timed out after 10010 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received  create_collection_label( data = data, path = "LabeleR_output", qr = "QR_code", field1.column = "field1", field2.column = "field2", field3.column = "field3", field4.column = "field6", field5.column = "field7"  ) #> Error in create_collection_label(data = data, path = "LabeleR_output",     qr = "QR_code", field1.column = "field1", field2.column = "field2",     field3.column = "field3", field4.column = "field6", field5.column = "field7"): The 'data' object must be a data frame.

what: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
text: Function create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page)

title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
code: create_herbarium_label(   data = data,   path = NULL,   title = NULL,   subtitle = NULL,   qr = NULL,   family.column = NULL,   taxon.column = NULL,   author.column = NULL,   det.column = NULL,   date.det.column = NULL,   location.column = NULL,   area.description.column = NULL,   latitude.column = NULL,   longitude.column = NULL,   elevation.column = NULL,   field1.column = NULL,   field2.column = NULL,   field3.column = NULL,   collector.column = NULL,   collection.column = NULL,   assistants.column = NULL,   date.column = NULL )

title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
text: data data frame create herbarium labels. path Folder path output printed title Main title top labels. Can blank set NULL. subtitle Subtitle bottom labels. Can blank set NULL. qr String. Free text column data specifies text create QR code. specified value column name data, QRs equal, output specified qr. family.column Column name data data frame specifies labels' family name. taxon.column Column name data data frame specifies labels' taxon. author.column Column name data data frame specifies taxons' author. det.column Column name data data frame specifies determiner voucher. date.det.column Column name data data frame specifies date voucher determined. location.column Column name data data frame specifies voucher collected. area.description.column Column name data data frame specifies decription area latitude.column Column name data data frame specifies latitude specimen collected. longitude.column Column name data data frame specifies longitude specimen collected. elevation.column Column name data data frame specifies elevation specimen collected. field1.column Column name data data frame specifying variable user's choice. Can blank set NULL. field2.column Column name data data frame specifying variable user's choice. Can blank set NULL. field3.column Column name data data frame specifying variable user's choice. Can blank set NULL. collector.column Column name data data frame specifies name collector voucher. collection.column Column name data data frame specifies voucher's collection number. assistants.column Column name data data frame specifies names collector's assistants. date.column Column name data data frame specifies date specimen collected.

title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
text: pdf file four herbarium labels per page within 'output' folder

title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
text: Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

title: Function to create herbaruim labels (4 per DIN-A4 page) — create_herbarium_label
code: # data=read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/         d/1Q005BDM0XyUNq5XzGWuvdzgZVMc4KhbYadVzi77h3Xw/edit?usp=sharing") #> Error in open.connection(structure(8L, class = c("curl", "connection"), conn_id = <pointer: 0x00000000000004d8>),     "rb"): Timeout was reached: [doc-0s-4o-sheets.googleusercontent.com] Operation timed out after 10004 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received create_herbarium_label( data=data, path = "LabeleR_output", title="Magical flora of the British Isles", subtitle="Project: Eliminating plant blindness in Hogwarts students", qr = "QR_code", family.column="Family", taxon.column="Taxon", author.column="Author", det.column="det/conf", date.det.column="Det_date", location.column="Location", area.description.column="Area_description", latitude.column="Latitude", longitude.column="Longitude", elevation.column="Elevation", field1.column="life_form", field2.column="Observations", field3.column="Height", collector.column="Collector", collection.column="Collection_number", assistants.column="Assistants", date.column="Date" ) #> Error in create_herbarium_label(data = data, path = "LabeleR_output",     title = "Magical flora of the British Isles", subtitle = "Project: Eliminating plant blindness in Hogwarts students",     qr = "QR_code", family.column = "Family", taxon.column = "Taxon",     author.column = "Author", det.column = "det/conf", date.det.column = "Det_date",     location.column = "Location", area.description.column = "Area_description",     latitude.column = "Latitude", longitude.column = "Longitude",     elevation.column = "Elevation", field1.column = "life_form",     field2.column = "Observations", field3.column = "Height",     collector.column = "Collector", collection.column = "Collection_number",     assistants.column = "Assistants", date.column = "Date"): The 'data' object must be a data frame.

text: data Data frame including create labels. qr String. Free text column data specifies text create QR code. specified value column name data, QRs equal, output specified qr. path Folder path output printed field1.column Column data specifies text print first field. field2.column Column data specifies text print second field. field3.column Column data specifies text print third field. field4.column Column data specifies text print fourth field. field5.column Column data specifies text print fifth field.

title: Function to create small collection labels (16 per page) — create_tinylabel
text: Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

title: Function to create small collection labels (16 per page) — create_tinylabel
code: data <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/         d/1Bd_IVgGup4MapTgPq-cqqP05zYl-Q4SfUCBJ5oDSrMs/edit?usp=sharing") create_tinylabel( data = data, qr = "QR_code", path = "LabeleR_output", field1.column = "campo1", field2.column = "campo2", field3.column = "campo3", field4.column = "campo4", field5.column = "campo5" ) #> Error in create_tinylabel(data = data, qr = "QR_code", path = "LabeleR_output",     field1.column = "campo1", field2.column = "campo2", field3.column = "campo3",     field4.column = "campo4", field5.column = "campo5"): Column 'campo1 is not a column of your 'data' object. Please select from  #> -field1 #> -field2 #> -field3 #> -field4 #> -field5 #> -field6 #> -field7 #> -QR_code
